Articles.Content:
Hello, and welcome to my ''namegiving'' thread!

What if you had a name for everything, on every planet and mun? (well, moon )

Like the enormous craters on the mun, what if they had names? Then you can tell your friends that landed in ''The Eye'' crater for example

Hope you like my idea!

This page is useful for the terms used to name planetary features:

http://planetarynames.wr.usgs.gov/DescriptorTerms
The Crater inside the crater on the foreward side of the Mun that has a mountain in it is Judy Mountain, named after my dead aunt Judy who I made a mission to that crater in memorial to her.
Could you post a picture, so noone takes your mountain?
